title.narrative: Expert Advisory Call Down Service - System's Integrity Review of the ESP II Programme

description.narrative: The overall purpose of this assignment is to provide assurance about ESP's operational environment, with a view to strengthening controls where necessary and to ensure the strongest possible mitigation against fiduciary risk, The impact of the programme is Poverty reduced and life chances improved for poor women, men and children in Uganda. The main outcome is Sustainable national social protection systems institutionalised and financed and reaching beneficiaries at national level.

The specific objective is to review systems, identify gaps and potential loopholes for fraud and/or inefficiences, if any, and propose feasible recommendations to strengthen them. An example of this is - Post Bank Cash Delivery System: with a focus on the chain of delivery from the PMU to the beneficiaries.

sector.narrative: Macro-economic, fiscal and monetary policy and planning; social planning; economic and social analysis and forecasting; development planning and preparation of structural reforms; organisational development; support to ministries involved in aid co-ordination; other ministries and government departments when sector cannot be specified. (Use code 51010 for budget support to macroeconomic reforms.)
